content: perfectly ruffled scrunchie p1ttern m1teri1ls bern&t velvet y&rn 6mm crochet hook medium hold h&ir el&stics y&rn needle stitches used single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain- chain&in double_crochet- double_crochet instructions single_crochet 28 into & h&ir el&stic join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet ch2 double_crochet 4 in s&me st double_crochet 5 in e&chain st &round to end slip_stitch to end &nd we&ve in the end done 6 minute-ish scrunchies you &re free to m&ke &nd sell to your he&rts desire but ple&se credit my shop @everythingcrochetb ymir&nd& on inst&gr&m &nd f&cebook &nd mir&nd& dielsen designs on r&velry much &ppreci&ted
